programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features main event Dricus 'Stillknocks' Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar in the Middleweight Championsihp from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: This episode features heavyweights Tomasz Adamek (217 lbs 40- 1- 0) vs. Chris Arreola (250? lbs. 28- 1- 0) from the Citizens Business Bank Arena, Ontario, California, USA on April 24, 2010.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Shohozan, Kakuryu, Okinoumi and Kitataiki from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Victor Ortiz vs. Vivian Harris
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Tito Ortiz, Donald Cerrone, Frank Mir and more!
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features main event Dricus 'Stillknocks' Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar in the Middleweight Championsihp from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: Tito Ortiz, Donald Cerrone, Frank Mir and more!

programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 4
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Paul Williams defending his welterweight championship against Carlos Quintana. The fight's result ultimately ended up being what might be considered one of the biggest upsets in boxing.

Plus, we speak with Academy Award winning actor Adrian Brody and get his impressions of attending his first big Judo event, and we follow 3 Georgian warriors who came to St.

programme.title: FS MMA Chael Sonnen vs. Tim McKenzie
programme.desc: MORE MMA MONDAY: Outspoken MMA superstar Chael Sonnen matches up with veteran Tim McKenzie of Stockton, California. McKenzie entered the bout with a record of 10-3, having won his last two fights by TKO over Doug Marshall and Mike McGuinnes. Sonnen was in between stints with the UFC at the time, having won his first two fights with Bodog leading into this one.

programme.title: WCCB Live Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez

Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Abu Dhabi Grand Slam
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Abu Dhabi Grand Slam on world Judo day, we speak to double world champion Mayra Aguiar about the unity of the Brazilian judo team, and watch as two world champions battle for gold in the -57kg division.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Dmitry Priog vs. Daniel Jacobs
programme.desc: This episode features a middleweight battle between Dmitry Priog and Daniel Jacobs that ends in a crushing overhand right, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Jose Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his NABF welterweight title against Jose Miguel Cotto, Alvarez's final bout before rising through the ranks and championships of the WBC. Also on the card, a heavyweight kickboxing clash between Errol Zimmerman vs. Rico Verhoeven.

programme.title: The Best Thing Since...
programme.desc: In a quest to dominate the growing commercial bread industry, Lee Marshall bets on a new kind of white loaf, unwittingly inspiring a housewife named Margaret Rudkin to come up with a healthier alternative.

programme.title: Peacekeepers (S1)
programme.desc: The Chinese Peacekeepers in South Sudan are put to the test by problems inside and outside the UN Headquarters in Juba.

programme.title: The Final Discovery
programme.desc: Racing an incoming hurricane, Darrell Miklos and his team are forced to make tough choices. But after a season-long search, they locate the source of the massive magnetometer hit recorded at Target 4.

programme.title: Death From Below
programme.desc: The team enlists a submarine to probe one of the deepest parts of the Bermuda Triangle in search of a ship that vanished in 1921. Are massive bubbles causing ships and planes to plummet to the ocean floor?

programme.title: The Chosen
programme.desc: From biblical patriarchs to modern-day alien abductees, there have been people who claimed to have contact with otherworldly beings. Could it be that they have been chosen to help carry out alien agenda?

programme.title: You Can Lead A Horse To A Locker

programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: The Talent Badge
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Squirrel Babies
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Ladybird's Gameshow
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers
programme.desc: When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's Grimbots steal the pole's marker.

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Chickenrat
programme.desc: It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Andy and the Tiger Cubs
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Mission: No Dogs Allowed
programme.desc: Charli is meeting her friend Annabel for lunch at the local cafe. But Tinks needs all her big dog energy to help Charli persuade the café owner to let them in.

programme.title: Cheetah and Warthog
programme.desc: This episode features the cheetah and warthog, and their wild connection - they both communicate using smell.

programme.title: Pirate Stickers
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have started collecting "Famous Pirates and Crew of the World" stickers only to discover there's one last rare sticker to find.

programme.title: The Tadpole Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Kite Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Treehouse Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jet Academy: Compass Navigators
programme.desc: Can Kyan and Foz use new compass skills to navigate their way out of an academy maze?

programme.title: Nomads, Mongolia
programme.desc: Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Free The Roads
programme.desc: Bulgy thinks that people should travel by bus instead of rail, that is until he tries carrying all their passengers.

programme.title: Cake Relocate
programme.desc: Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Lost Librarian
programme.desc: The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Knitting
programme.desc: Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Runaway Train
programme.desc: Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Know It All
programme.desc: Monty and his best friend pet pig Jimmy Jones dance and sing to a song about creatures who seem to know it all.

programme.title: It's Time to Go Camping
programme.desc: JoJo's excited to go on her first camping trip with Gran Gran, Cousin Lexi and Uncle Tyrell. It'll be JoJo's first time sleeping outside, and there's lots to find out about camping.

programme.title: Onesies
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Tradies
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Granny Mobile
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: The Teamwork Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Pottery Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Quacky!
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers
programme.desc: When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's Grimbots steal the pole's marker.

programme.title: Fig
programme.desc: It's the nicest, kindest, Fig, performing his song, "Just Can't Help Being Sweet!"

programme.title: Apple
programme.desc: Apple sings in celebration of her great-great-grandad, Apple Tree's, 100th birthday.

programme.title: Veggies Got to Dance
programme.desc: Supertato's dancing is too powerful and too destructive but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance off to save his trapped friends he soon realises his dancing can save the day.

programme.title: Banana's Star Appeal
programme.desc: Banana superstar's show is stopped when Pea steals his peel. Supertato races against Evil Pea to get it back but trouble hits when a giant Banana statue collapses onto the stage.

programme.title: The Mime Badge
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: The Why Badge
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: The Sibling Badge
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Cool, Man
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Potato Time
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Song of Peace
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Phones
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Pavlova
programme.desc: Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Café in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Noise
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Tubby Custard and Toast
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about the wonders of Tubby Custard and Toast.

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Phoebe and her friends are enjoying a Pop Paper City winter wonderland! But can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snowstorm arrives?

programme.title: Dog Loves Anthology
programme.desc: Dog wants some high adventure and so he and Pug visit several different stories. Each time they arrive in their new story, they find that they are being chased by various characters.

programme.title: Me and My Shadow
programme.desc: When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: A Case of the Lightnings
programme.desc: Messy and friends visit Fluff the Cloud's family, and things heat up in flash when her brother Nimby gets the lightnings.

programme.title: Piggy Dreamer
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: It's Time for Poetry
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran read poetry at the library and Jared performs a rap-poem for them at the shop! JoJo & Gran Gran decide to write their own poem and go in search of inspiration!

programme.title: It's Time for a Tea Party
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran discover Ezra's having a Tyrannosaurus Tea Party at the Museum! But, when Ezra doesn't have time to make his special strawberry cake, Gran Gran has a plan to help!

programme.title: Ribbon Fall
programme.desc: The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

programme.title: Garden Gaming
programme.desc: Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a new version.

programme.title: The Inventor's Spectacular Bridge
programme.desc: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

programme.title: Shaun
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Daddy Putdown
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Dance Mode
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Speedy Pea
programme.desc: Evil Pea steals Supertato's brand new Tato Car but doesn't realise that the Grape Kids are in the back seat. Supertato has to get the Grape Kids back to safety and save his car.

programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Song of Peace
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Phones
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Pavlova
programme.desc: Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Café in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Noise
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Tubby Custard and Toast
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about the wonders of Tubby Custard and Toast.

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Phoebe and her friends are enjoying a Pop Paper City winter wonderland! But can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snowstorm arrives?

programme.title: Dog Loves Anthology
programme.desc: Dog wants some high adventure and so he and Pug visit several different stories. Each time they arrive in their new story, they find that they are being chased by various characters.

programme.title: Me and My Shadow
programme.desc: When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: A Case of the Lightnings
programme.desc: Messy and friends visit Fluff the Cloud's family, and things heat up in flash when her brother Nimby gets the lightnings.

programme.title: Piggy Dreamer
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: It's Time for Poetry
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran read poetry at the library and Jared performs a rap-poem for them at the shop! JoJo & Gran Gran decide to write their own poem and go in search of inspiration!

programme.title: It's Time for a Tea Party
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran discover Ezra's having a Tyrannosaurus Tea Party at the Museum! But, when Ezra doesn't have time to make his special strawberry cake, Gran Gran has a plan to help!

programme.title: Ribbon Fall
programme.desc: The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

programme.title: Garden Gaming
programme.desc: Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a new version.

programme.title: The Inventor's Spectacular Bridge
programme.desc: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

programme.title: Shaun
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Daddy Putdown
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Dance Mode
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Speedy Pea
programme.desc: Evil Pea steals Supertato's brand new Tato Car but doesn't realise that the Grape Kids are in the back seat. Supertato has to get the Grape Kids back to safety and save his car.

programme.desc: Glitch creates trouble with a little pyramid when he and the Go Jetters visit the Pyramids of Giza in Egypt.

programme.title: Stonehenge, England

programme.desc: Mason is cooking a recipe named after the place it comes from: Yorkshire. Mason serves his recipe with broccoli, and lots of gravy.

programme.desc: Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Captain Captain's Best Bits

programme.title: Movie - Vivegam
programme.desc: Ajay Kumar, a former counter-terrorism agent, is called in for a special mission. However, he is betrayed by his friends and is accused of extremely treasonous acts.

programme.title: Movie - Kumaran Rajini Rasigan
programme.desc: Kumaran, a Rajinikanth fan, leaves his house after a fight with his childhood friend Chitti. Twelve years later, he awaits Chitti's arrival to unite with her after years of separation.

programme.title: Movie - Sumai
programme.desc: Sathyan, a middle-class man, works hard and saves every penny to financially support his large family. However, his father always gets into trouble by stealing money or gambling with his friends.

programme.title: Movie - Thaali Dhaanam
programme.desc: Sridhar's mother gets him married to Kalyani, a kind and generous woman. Though they have a happy married life for 12 years, Kalyani is devastated when she is unable to become a mother.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: Fillers

programme.title: Movie - Gemini
programme.desc: Gemini, a gangster, falls for Manisha who reciprocates his love without knowing his truth. After getting arrested and completing his term, he tries to convince his lover that he is a changed man.

programme.title: Movie - Arai Enn 305il Kadavul
programme.desc: Two men, who are extremely fed up with their work and non-existent love life, vent their frustration towards God. Affected by their words, He visits them along with a box of power.

programme.title: Movie - Sethupathy IPS
programme.desc: Sethupathi, an efficient IPS officer, saves the life of the country's prime minister and then tackles a dangerous terrorist who wants to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Movie - Kanda Kadamba Kadhirvela
programme.desc: Three brothers who come from a rich family live as dictated by their strict mother. They also have a sister who was chased out of the home because she married a poor man. Things change for them when the poor man enters the home.

programme.title: Movie - Kanchana 2
programme.desc: A cameraman is petrified of ghosts but obliges when his director proposes a show on ghosts to revive their TV channel. However, strange things happen when they start working on the show.

programme.title: Movie - Acham Enbathu Madamayada
programme.desc: Rajinikanth and Leela, a young couple, embark on a road trip. However, little do they know that unfortunate instances are going to put their lives at stake.

programme.title: Movie - Thai Pongal
programme.desc: Janaki loses her husband early in her life and is left with a girl child. Without any support, she experiences tough situations involving lecherous men. She meets Vairam who supports her.

programme.title: Movie - Thathi Thavuthu Manasu
programme.desc: Three village girls who yearn to taste the big city life get to attend a friend's wedding in Chennai. But their joy comes to a halt when their money is stolen, leaving them stranded.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: Fillers

programme.title: Movie - Febrauary 14
programme.desc: Shiva falls in love with Pooja, a girl raised in the US, who is in India visiting her grandparents. When she wants to return to the US, he creates a fictitious character to impress her.

programme.title: Movie - Vanchinathan
programme.desc: A cop, who can go to any means to arrest a criminal, is challenged by a popular newspaper owner, who always prints chaotic news. He was the eye witness to the murder done by the newspaper owner but he cannot prove it.

programme.title: Movie - Pithamagan
programme.desc: A young orphan grows up in a graveyard and is devoid of any human feelings; when he leaves the cemetery and meets people, he experiences emotions for the first time.

programme.title: Movie - Tik Tik Tik (New)
programme.desc: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission. He along with his team must stop an asteroid, advancing towards Earth, from causing damage and destruction.

programme.title: Movie - Paapanasam
programme.desc: Suyambulingam, a school drop-out but an intelligent man, acquires knowledge by watching movies. When a dark incident seems to ruin his family, he uses all his wits to protect them.

programme.title: Road To Eternity
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Eternity
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Wax and Wane
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Biduan Es Serut Asoy
programme.desc: Lela is an ice shaver seller who inherited her profession from her mother. Lela sells her ice shavers in front of Bobb's office, but Bobby chases her away because she dances to dangdut music while selling her ice shavers from her cart, which disturbs Bobby who is working. Lela is struck by Bobby's kindness. Could it be that the seeds of love are also sprouting between Bobby and Lela?

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Neng OB Kalau Sudah Aktif Bikin Mleyot
programme.desc: Gebi is a housekeeper at one of Rino's hotels. Gebi first met Rino when she was hit by a car in an accident. Being the arrogant son of a wealthy man, Rino said he would pay her double compensation. As a result of Rino's arrogant attitude, Gebi swore she would never see Rino again.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Biduan Es Serut Asoy
programme.desc: Lela is an ice shaver seller who inherited her profession from her mother. Lela sells her ice shavers in front of Bobb's office, but Bobby chases her away because she dances to dangdut music while selling her ice shavers from her cart, which disturbs Bobby who is working. Lela is struck by Bobby's kindness. Could it be that the seeds of love are also sprouting between Bobby and Lela?

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Neng OB Kalau Sudah Aktif Bikin Mleyot

programme.title: Berburu Cinta Mantanku
programme.desc: Lately, Tania has been very busy with work, which has caused her stomach to hurt. According to the lab results, the pain in her stomach is due to liver cancer. Tania is sad and desperate, even avoiding Adit. Adit, confused about why Tania has changed, suspects that she is having an affair. It turns out that Tania's lab results were mixed up, and she actually has acute gastritis. Tania is overjoyed and wants to explain everything to Adit.

programme.title: ANAK BAND

programme.title: Tukang Foto Cintanya Jeprat Jepret
programme.desc: Rico was caught cheating with his ex, and Mika wanted to cancel her pre-wedding photoshoot with Rico. Yuda, as a photographer and Rico's good friend, was tasked with persuading Mika.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta

programme.title: Batagor 3 Cinta
programme.desc: Andra, who is modestly dressed but also handsome, is very popular with the girls on campus. Nina has been Andra's friend since childhood, but she also has feelings for him. However, Nina is not the only one who likes Andra; there are also Ayu, Prita, and Clara. Andra is dating Prita but is jealous of Nina. Andra's love life is complicated.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Wanted Abang Duda Sempurna
programme.desc: Naufal and Nayla plan to make their older brother Adi closer to Vanya. As a result, Naufal and Nayla prank Adi and Vanya by having Naufal pretend that Nayla drowned in the lake.

programme.title: Netbusters 2025/26
programme.desc: Relive the best action from the Premier League with this fast-paced ISO angle highlights show, featuring every game and every goal from each matchround.

programme.title: PL Preview 2025/26
programme.desc: A tightly packed look-ahead to the forthcoming matchround with a mix of player interviews and special features.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Manchester City have won five of their last eight Premier League matches against Manchester United (D1 L2), though they failed to win either game (D1 L1) last season for the first time since 2020-21.

programme.title: PL Moments 2025/26
programme.desc: PL Moments combines archive and first person testimony to revisit the very best games, goals, players and performances from the last 30 years.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26
programme.desc: Jarrod Bowen has become an icon at West Ham, scoring the goal that brought European glory in 2023. The club captain recalls some key moments in the Hammers’ 2024/25 campaign, alongside James Ward-Prowse and Head Coach Graham Potter.

programme.title: Fantasy Show 2025/26
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: PL Preview 2025/26
programme.desc: A tightly packed look-ahead to the forthcoming matchround with a mix of player interviews and special features.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Burnley have lost 14 of their 18 Premier League matches against Liverpool (W2 D2), including each of their last five in a row since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool (D14 L13) and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have lost just two of their last 17 away Premier League matches (W8 D7), keeping nine clean sheets in their previous 15 on the road. Their previous nine away clean sheets beforehand came over a spell of 51 games.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26
programme.desc: Iliman Ndiaye will forever go down in history as the man who scored the last ever goal at Everton’s famous old ground Goodison Park, only to follow it this season with the first strike at their impressive new home, Hill Dickinson Stadium. This week, Everton’s talismanic forward shares his fascinating story. Having grown up in Senegal and France, the young man struggled to make his mark in the game before moving to England with his father.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea (W5 D7) since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26
programme.desc: Jarrod Bowen has become an icon at West Ham, scoring the goal that brought European glory in 2023. The club captain recalls some key moments in the Hammers’ 2024/25 campaign, alongside James Ward-Prowse and Head Coach Graham Potter.

programme.title: PL Moments 2025/26
programme.desc: PL Moments combines archive and first person testimony to revisit the very best games, goals, players and performances from the last 30 years.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Wolves are winless in their last four Premier League meetings with Leeds United (D1 L3) despite scoring first in three of those games.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Only Nicolas Anelka (18) has more Premier League goals against sides he previously played for in the competition than Nottingham Forest’s Chris Wood (14), two of which came against Burnley on his last league trip to Turf Moor in May 2024.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season - the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool (D14 L13) and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: The Saturday Wrap 2025/26
programme.desc: A complete review of all the day’s Premier League football, with highlights and studio discussion. The Saturday Wrap broadcasts immediately after Premier League Live on Saturday.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have lost just two of their last 17 away Premier League matches (W8 D7), keeping nine clean sheets in their previous 15 on the road. Their previous nine away clean sheets beforehand came over a spell of 51 games.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Fulham completed a Premier League double over Brentford last season and are looking to win three league games in a row over the Bees for the second time, after winning their first three clashes from 1928 to 1929.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool (D14 L13) and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea (W5 D7) since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Sunderland last won their first three home top-flight games in a season back in 1965-66, while the last newly promoted side to win their first three home games in the Premier League were Burnley in 2009-10.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City (D2), as many as their previous 22 beforehand (D5 L15). The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015.

programme.title: How New Magnets Could Power the Future
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Can Living Human Brain Cells Power AI?

programme.desc: Francine visits Finland, where the threat from Russia looms large. She speaks to President Alexander Stubb about Finnish resilience and how his country is preparing for an uncertain future.

programme.title: Robots: The Aliens We Made
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Love in the Age of Machines
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Your Brain Is the Next Tech Frontier
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: How Tech Is Breaking the Rules of Biology
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Why Wall Street Is Going South
programme.desc: There's been a migration of financial powerbrokers to South Florida in recent years, drawn by the weather, light regulation and low taxes.

programme.title: The Gambler's Edge on Wall Street
programme.desc: Strategy. Risk. Pattern recognition. Wall Street pros often play poker, chess, blackjack and other games that rely on skills that are highly transferable to their work.

programme.title: The New Rules of Financial Literacy
programme.desc: Building wealth used to follow a formula, but these days investing tools are at everyone's fingertips. Is this the chance for generational wealth or a siren call for suckers?

programme.title: Meet the Women of Wall Street
programme.desc: Finance is an industry dominated by men, but women are rising and controlling more wealth globally. How did the women of Wall Street break through, and what's changing now that they have?

programme.title: Wall Street Wants to Fix the Housing Crisis
programme.desc: Sonali Basak speaks with two of the most influential investors in American real estate to understand how private capital is reshaping the housing market.

programme.title: Alexander Stubb, President of Finland
programme.desc: Francine visits Finland, where the threat from Russia looms large. She speaks to President Alexander Stubb about Finnish resilience and how his country is preparing for an uncertain future.

programme.title: Brazil's Biggest Bank Heist
programme.desc: This is the tale of Brazil's largest bank robbery. At the heart of this crime is South America's most dangerous mafia and a daring heist which took place on what's now known as the "Night of Terror".

programme.title: The IM Academy Story
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom. But some former members say it was a global multilevel-marketing maze that left them financially and emotionally devastated.

programme.title: Murder on Rainbow Mountain
programme.desc: Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds. But behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war and cries for help ignored.

programme.title: Inside A UK Care Visa Scam
programme.desc: Alleged scammers in the UK are accused of defrauding would-be migrant healthcare workers out of tens of thousands of pounds. Some victims have turned to a vigilante "scammer hunter" for help.

programme.title: The Dirty Business of Monkey Laundering
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Scambaiter Exposes Massive Dubai Crypto Scam
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Inside India's Fertility Underworld
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Dusk Or Dawn
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: Shelter
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: Regenerate
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: Nourish
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: Move
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: Transform
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau visits Germany where a port is working on the ultimate sustainable solution, and travels to Kenya and Greenland to learn how art and living in harmony can help humans.

programme.title: The College Sports Buzz With Georgia Tech's J Batt
programme.desc: The College Sports Buzz With Georgia Tech's J Batt. Georgia Tech Athletics Director J Batt discusses the buzz around college athletics, including NIL and the transfer portal.

programme.title: The Future of Racing with F1 Academy's Susie Wolff
programme.desc: The Future of Racing with F1 Academy's Susie Wolff. Susie Wolff, the managing director of F1 Academy, chats about how she's helping more female racers try to advance into the ranks of Formula One.

programme.title: The Commanders DC Deal with Josh Harris
programme.desc: The Commanders DC Deal with Josh Harris. 26North founder and Washington Commanders owner Josh Harris talks about the team's recent stadium deal in DC and his mindset on team ownership.

programme.title: Super Intelligence
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: Animal Communication
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: Quantum Computing
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.desc: When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward's delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.desc: Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed. // SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: Cookie's Court / Work Her Magic
programme.desc: After losing Hazel to Cosmo and Wanda during the Wish Trials, a scheming Cookie returns for revenge .// Frustrated by her mom's split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her.

programme.title: Lost and Founders Day Pt. 1 / Lost and Founders Day Pt. 2
programme.desc: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants at the annual Founder's Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: No Laughing Matter / No Spoilers
programme.desc: When Luan overhears her siblings complaining about her comedy, she decides to give it up. // Knowing Leni's history of spoiling surprises, the kids don't tell her about Mom's upcoming party.

programme.title: Legends / Mall of Duty
programme.desc: Dad and Lincoln get on "Legends of the Hidden Temple" and can't wait to for a whole day of father/son bonding. // Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters so he decides to take them to the mall.

programme.title: Flip This Flip
programme.desc: The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image to impress his middle school crush.

programme.title: Lost in Bikini Bottom / Tutor Sauce
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his driver's test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: Squid Plus One / The Executive Treatment
programme.desc: After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him. // While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: For Your Spies Only
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without adult supervision. When Jinx finds the Air Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school, and his meddling puts the Thundermans' school jobs at risk.

programme.title: Radioactive Cat
programme.desc: Bose's Mom, Celia, picks up Schwoz's lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: Text, Lies, & Video
programme.desc: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must go to great lengths to get it back so that his secret identity isn't revealed.

programme.title: Driven to Drive / A Patty in Time
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive. // Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item.

programme.title: Sharks vs. Pods / CopyBob DittoPants
programme.desc: The Sharks' are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle. // Plankton clones SpongeBob in an effort to steal Krabs' secret formula, but original Bob might ruin his plans.

programme.title: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow
programme.desc: When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: Face the Music with the Casagrandes / Pranks for the Memories with the Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne discovers that each family member will perform for Hector's birthday, she turns to Sid for help. // Ronnie Anne's attempts to bond with her cool older cousin Carlota lead to a prank war against the boy cousins.

programme.title: Store Wars with the Casagrandes / Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes
programme.desc: When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. // Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loudest Yard / Raw Deal
programme.desc: When Lincoln's mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincoln's fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster", Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac.

programme.title: Peace of Pizza / A New Dev-Elopment
programme.desc: When Dev refuses to participate in Kindness Day, Hazel summons an intergalactic species of diplomats to reason with him. // Hazel learns more about her nemesis, Dev, when forced to work with him on a class project.

programme.title: Potazel Potahzel / The Haunting of Wells House
programme.desc: Hazel faces Mother Nature after her wish for unlimited French fries threatens the global supply of potatoes. // After several paranormal incidents in the Wells Home, Hazel wishes Marcus had a ghost tracking show to investigate.

programme.title: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs
programme.desc: Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague
programme.desc: SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: Family Lies
programme.desc: It's Parents' Night at SW.A.G. and Ray must get Danger Force to take a picture with their parents in the school or be shut down. But things get complicated when Chapa hires Jake Hart to be her fake dad.

programme.title: No Friend In Sight
programme.desc: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle for the ages over her. Chloe's new alone time is interrupted by living room-crashing pelican.

programme.title: The Beat Goes On
programme.desc: With the return on Dr. Minyak, Henry finds himself in danger when he realizes that the evil doer has transformed his best friend, Charlotte, into a super strong being set to capture Kid Danger and Captain Man.

programme.title: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never
programme.desc: Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: The Mad Scientist / Missed Connection
programme.desc: Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family. // Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

programme.title: Director's Rut / Friday Night Fights
programme.desc: Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her school's play. // Lisa joins Lynn's football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

programme.title: Mikey Takes Charge
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.title: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: Patnocchio / ChefBob
programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards
programme.desc: Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: Flight Plan
programme.desc: Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Cursed!
programme.desc: Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.title: Lost and Founders Day Pt. 1 / Lost and Founders Day Pt. 2
programme.desc: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants at the annual Founder's Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: Remember the Date
programme.desc: Hazel tries to help Marcus and Angela celebrate their anniversary, but things go awry when her wish erases their memory!

programme.title: The Snail Whisperer / Smurfs Might Fly
programme.desc: Farmer's snails are tired of their life of toil and decide to go on strike and join Wild for a life of freedom. // The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket.

programme.title: Happy Smurfs Fool Day! / The Wrench Smurf
programme.desc: It's Smurfs Fool Day and Jokey is beside himself with excitement. // When Handy turns the Diaper Daddy Robot into his assistant, the machine's memory accidentally gets wiped.

programme.title: Waffles and Punishment / Never Wake a Sleeping Sorcerer
programme.desc: When Storm gets close to beating him in a waffle-eating contest, Greedy takes the competition too far. // When Gargamel sleepwalks into the Smurfs' Village, the Smurfs make the most of the situation.

programme.title: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: V.I.Peeved / Senor Class
programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: Little Patscals / The Pre-Historic Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick learns what GrandPat's childhood was like. // Cave Pat hosts a show with his cave family.

programme.title: Sanctuary! / What's Eating Patrick?
programme.desc: When stray snails start appearing around Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob decides to care for them himself. // To defend Bikini Bottom's honor, Patrick enters a Krabby Patty eating competition.

programme.title: Patrick! The Game / The Sewers of Bikini Bottom
programme.desc: Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him. // After accidentally flushing Mr. Krabs' safe, SpongeBob and Squidward must go into the sewers to find it.

programme.title: SpongeBob LongPants / Larry's Gym
programme.desc: SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steve's bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.title: Krampapalooza
programme.desc: Danger Force sees an opportunity to make money fast by hosting Swellview's hottest music festival, but they catch a case of the Kramps when Krampus threatens to ruin their plans.

programme.title: Grave Danger
programme.desc: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover what's been causing it.

programme.title: Mikey Takes Charge
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.title: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: Maybe-Sitter
programme.desc: With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: Blood Is Thicker Than Grease / Don't Make Me Laugh
programme.desc: Plankton's family open their own restaurant...directly next to the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob suddenly finds everything funny...much to everyone's annoyance.

programme.title: Momageddon / Pet the Rock
programme.desc: The Krusty Krew get lazy when their moms take over the Krusty Krab. // Patrick's new pet rock catches the eye of a mischievous rock collector.

programme.title: Tango Tangle / Necro-Nom-Nom-Nom-I-Con
programme.desc: Plankton and Karen take dance lessons and quickly become the top of the class. // Equipped with a magical spell book, SpongeBob cooks up chaos in the Krusty Krab kitchen.

programme.title: Driven to Drive / A Patty in Time
programme.desc: In a Patrick Show episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive. // Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item.

programme.title: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard
programme.desc: After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: Fandom Pains / Rita Her Rights
programme.desc: Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds it's more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: The Mad Scientist / Missed Connection
programme.desc: Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family. // Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

programme.title: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail
programme.desc: The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.title: Pineapple Invasion / Salsa Imbecilicus
programme.desc: When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, it's up to Gary to protect it from Plankton. // When a freak accident causes everyone in town to become as stupid as Patrick, Sandy must save the day.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Krusty / The Whole Tooth
programme.desc: When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patrick's last baby tooth needs to come out, but he's afraid to let it go.

programme.title: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow
programme.desc: When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia / Fearless
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmine's fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: Patty Possum's Party Playground / Remember the Date
programme.desc: A trip to Patty Possum's Party Playground turns chilling when Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum to life. // Hazel tries to help Marcus and Angela celebrate their anniversary, but things go awry when her wish erases their memory!

programme.title: Read Aloud / Not a Loud
programme.desc: The family embarks on a reading challenge at the library but Lola refuses to participate. // When Lincoln discovers the first page of his baby book is blank, he worries his parents are hiding something.

programme.title: School of Shock / Elecshunned
programme.desc: Lisa takes over her first-grade classroom and learns that there's more to teaching than just knowing facts. // Leni goes toe-to-toe with the Mayor in a city-wide Royal Woods election.

programme.title: Haunted House Call
programme.desc: When the Mortician's Club can't afford tickets to Casket Con, they decide to start a business to raise money.

programme.title: Company Picnic / Pull Up a Barrel
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs throws a company picnic to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day! // Mr. Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his old Navy days.

programme.title: Sanctuary! / What's Eating Patrick?
programme.desc: When stray snails start appearing around Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob decides to care for them himself. // To defend Bikini Bottom's honor, Patrick enters a Krabby Patty eating competition.

programme.title: No Friend In Sight
programme.desc: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle for the ages over her. Chloe's new alone time is interrupted by living room-crashing pelican.

programme.title: Miles Has Visions
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellview's leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Opposite Universe
programme.desc: Henry and Charlotte are transported into an opposite universe where Ray and Schwoz are evil and want to destroy Piper. They must stop Evil Ray and Evil Schwoz and figure out how to get back to their universe.

programme.title: Pat-per Route / Day of the Dartfish
programme.desc: Patrick helps Squidward with his newspaper delivery job to compensate for injuring him. // In the midst of a typical day of scavenging, the Dartfish family discovers a thief in the Star home.

programme.title: Mimic Madness / House Worming
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering
programme.desc: Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: Dance, Dance Resolution / A Fair to Remember
programme.desc: It's the Sadie Hawkins dance at school and Lincoln's sisters have accidentally landed him four dates! // When Lincoln and Bobby become friends, Lori sets out to make Bobby jealous by hanging out with Clyde.

programme.title: One of the Boys / A Tattler's Tale
programme.desc: Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality. // Lola wants to be a part of the siblings' secrets club, but they won't let her in because she's a 'tattle tale'.

programme.title: Funny Business / Snow Bored
programme.desc: Lincoln becomes Luan's clown assistant but starts hogging the spotlight. // The Loud kids set out to show Lisa what is 'fun' about a snow day.

programme.title: Stuck in my Head / Mind the Gap
programme.desc: When Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine fail a BFF Compatibility Test, Hazel makes a wish that lands them inside her mind. // When Hazel wishes she didn't have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with an obnoxious talking tooth.

programme.title: Growing Pains / Fairy for a Day
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 to get into a movie, the fairy version of puberty hits her all at once! // Hazel wishes to be a fairy for a day, but things go awry when her anti-fairy shows up to cause chaos!

programme.title: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode
programme.desc: Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering
programme.desc: The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: Earth To Bose
programme.desc: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien.

programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steve's bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.title: FedEx Open de France Day 2
programme.desc: The FedEx Open de France is a professional golf tournament held annually in France. It's also known as the Open de France and is the oldest national open in continental Europe, first played in 1906. FedEx is the title sponsor of the event.

programme.title: Open de Portugal
programme.desc: The Challenge Series features the key events on the European Challenge Tour. In keeping with the profile of the Tour’s players, the programming has a more youth orientated and dynamic look and feel to the typical golf shows. The content provides close up profiles with the future stars, life-style features, as well as all the exciting final day action from the event.

programme.title: Nationwide Children's Hospital Championship Round 2
programme.desc: The Nationwide Children's Hospital Championship is a Korn Ferry Tour event, part of the pathway for professional golfers to earn a PGA Tour card. The winner of the Nationwide Children's Hospital Championship also earns a spot in the Players Championship and US Open.

programme.title: Walmart NW Arkansas Championship presented by P&G Round 1
programme.desc: The Walmart NW Arkansas Championship presented by P&G is an annual LPGA Tour golf tournament held at Pinnacle Country Club in Rogers, Arkansas. It's a prominent event known for attracting top female golfers and offering a large purse, currently at $3 million. It's consistently held at Pinnacle Country Club in Rogers, Arkansas since its inception in 2007.

programme.title: Akira Kono, NYK

programme.title: Lele Hati Ini Meyakinkanmu, Cinta Ini Mematilku
programme.desc: Lele Hati Ini Meyakinkanmu Cinta Ini Mematilku tells the story of a handsome young man named Argo. It is said that Argo was suddenly dumped by his girlfriend after he lost a race. So, it's like Argo is experiencing a series of bad things or has fallen and been hit by a ladder. Argo is seen as a loser. Eventually, Argo meets Nurlela, a beautiful catfish farmer, and he suddenly confesses to his ex-girlfriend that this beautiful catfish farmer is his new girlfriend.
