programme.title: Kami Geng Bola
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan debat secara santai, komedi dan berat sebelah mengenai semua perlawanan tumpuan di liga domestic dan antarbangsa. Rancangan ini akan dihoskan oleh Dato' Afdlin Shauki.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan
programme.desc: Tina cuba untuk mengambil hati Megat Arif namun Megat Arif masih tidak dapat melupakan Tihani. Adakah Megat Arif dapat melupakan Tihani dan menerima Tina untuk memulakan kehidupan baru ?

programme.title: Sejuta Rasa Buat Adelia
programme.desc: Chef Adelia terpaksa menempuh sejuta perasaan dan rasa, demi membuktikan kebolehannya untuk memasak apabila mendapat tahu lelaki yang mengkritik makanannya adalah bos barunya, Idlan.

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Alisa yang cuba untuk menjejaki ibu kandungnya. Sepanjang perjalanan itu dia mengenali Raykal dan Shun. Siapakah di antara dua lelaki ini yang dapat memenangi hati Alisa?

programme.title: Gadis EXXtra - Saiz Bukan Ukuran
programme.desc: Gadis EXXtra sebuah drama komedi tentang kehidupan tiga orang gadis, Nina, Irwinda dan Sahira yang baru saja mendapatkan ijazah tetapi terpaksa berdepan pelbagai masalah sebelum berjaya.

programme.title: Bunga Hati
programme.desc: Seorang gadis miskin berdepan dengan konflik antara ibu yang membencinya dan abangnya yang cacat serta terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi antara kekasih pertama dan doktor jutawan.

programme.title: Unplugged 2019
programme.desc: Persembahan artis-artis tempatan dengan gabungan lagu baru dan lama bersama hos Elly Arifin dalam membongkar rahsia di sebalik pembikinan lagu tersebut.

programme.title: Dahlia
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Ambil Padang Kami
programme.desc: Pelbagai konflik dan cabaran hidup dilalui tujuh sekawan ini dalam menyelamatkan padang mereka daripada dijadikan kawasan pembangunan.

programme.title: Di Balik Idola
programme.desc: Program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka membariskan penyanyi dan pelakon. Berkongsi pengalaman dan cerita yang belum pernah diketahui oleh masyarakat.

programme.title: Makan
programme.desc: Meneroka masakan yang lain dari yang lain, memberikan tips mudah ketika di dapur dan membawa anda ke restoran-restoran yang terkemuka di sekitar Kuala Lumpur

programme.title: Hard to Heart S4
programme.desc: Musim terbaru yang lebih hangat bersama artis tersohor, mengenai jatuh bangun mereka dalam sepanjang terbabit dengan kerjaya seni tempatan.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Letih melayan pelbagai dugaan yang dihadapi Stella. Nik tekad untuk menukarkan identiti baru Stella dengan bapanya, Corrie dan dunia seni buat selama-lamanya!

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Amnah hairan Stella sanggup bersusah payah untuk merawat Rara yang terkena HFMD. Padahal Corrie dan Rozie adalah ibu bapa Rara yang sebenar. Nik menyelamatkan Sofi daripada diserbu oleh pihak polis.

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Pihak polis mengesyaki Amnah menutupi rahsia sulit Stella. Nik patah hati apabila mengetahui Stella menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Ben Rylan.

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Nik terpaksa menutup pusat karoeke Che Loma. Keputusan ini tidak dipersetujui oleh Candy. Stella terikat dengan kontrak produk kurus Cocofit.

programme.title: From KL to PL
programme.desc: 4 selebriti Malaysia diberi kejutan dan peluang untuk menonton perlawanan Liga Perdana. Bagaimanapun, hanya seorang daripada mereka yang boleh memenangi tiket

programme.title: Fantasy Escape
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merealisasikan impian peminat bertuah untuk melakukan aktiviti yang mereka gemari bersama selebriti pilihan mereka yang turut berkongsi pengalaman dan memberi motivasi.

programme.title: PHD Muzik
programme.desc: Sebuah game show yang menggabungkan artis dan pasangan mereka bertarung dalam pelbagai jenis permainan untuk memenangi gelaran "PHD Muzik".

programme.title: Kak Kek Baru Nak Up
programme.desc: Kerana desakan kewangan, seorang wanita kembali memperkasakan adat dan budaya ibunya dengan cara tersendiri dan secara tidak sengaja ianya menjadi ikutan ramai.

programme.title: The House Season 5
programme.desc: The House adalah program tempatan di mana golongan elit dan selebriti Malaysia merasai pengalaman hidup di kampung dalam masa seminggu.

programme.title: Cheap Thrills
programme.desc: Syafa dan Pink Azwan menjelajah hampir seluruh semenanjung Malaysia mencari tempat-tempat yang sesuai untuk healing dan menjenguk lokasi di mana kita boleh shopping barang-barang yang tak lapuk dek zaman.

programme.title: The Lucky Bini Show
programme.desc: Pelbagai permainan yang menyeronokkan & menarik yang dibuat untuk pasangan selebriti yang sudah berkahwin, tindakan dan jawapan mereka yang tidak dapat diramalkan melalui kuiz dan permainan fizikal.

programme.title: Ahli Bapak Bapak Club
programme.desc: Mengisahkan 3 sahabat baik, Joe, Bob dan Nick dalam mengharungi kehidupan mereka yang penuh dugaan dan pancaroba selaku lelaki, suami dan bapa.

programme.title: Chef Terjun
programme.desc: Hos Akhmal Nazri memberanikan diri untuk keluar dari zon selesanya dan menyahut cabaran untuk menjadi tukang masak untuk satu hari di tempat-tempat makan yang terkenal di Malaysia.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: Baikpunya
programme.desc: Program ini akan membawa anda dalam perjalanan untuk mengetahui tempat-tempat tersembunyi dan tempat-tempat popular di Malaysia yang disyorkan oleh penduduk tempatan.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: Maskulin: Who's Your Bro
programme.desc: Rancangan realiti kecergasan penuh adrenalin yang mendefinisikan persaudaraan lelaki! 12 peserta dari pelbagai latar belakang akan berdepan cabaran fizikal dan emosi serta pemikiran strategik.

programme.title: Next To Neelofa
programme.desc: Program bual bicara Neelofa bakal membincangkan secara mendalam beberapa topik merangkumi kesihatan, kesejahteraan, cinta, kecantikan & gaya, perihal wanita, keibubapaan, perhubungan dan kerjaya.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Episode 3 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: In Ai, Ai, Cef!, kids take over the kitchen as head chefs and go head to head in the ultimate cook-off! But every chef needs an assistant, and in AI, AI, CEF, two stars will join our little chefs in their mission to improve the judges - but with their faces hidden behind masks. Who are these assistant chefs? In each episode, two well-known figures --- actors, singers, influencers, athletes, housing agents and more --- join the show as mystery guest.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 8 - Digestive system (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Why is the digestive system important and how it can affect our health? The doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT - Suzairhe and Haizad, together with our panel of experts will discuss on the different types of tummy ailment - gastric, dyspepsia and stomach ache. The panel of celebrity also shares their own experience. Also learn what to eat to keep your digestive system healthy.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 32 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: The story of Icha and Saiful unfolds as they confront life's difficulties when their marriage is shaken by a storm. Saiful is diagnosed with cancer and Icha's health starts to decline as a result of past events.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 12 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: A variety show that requires the contestants to complete the lyrics of a song on an empty board infront of them.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 2
programme.desc: Adi, 28, has been wheelchair-bound since an accident which happened when he was 10. As a young kid, he remembers vaguely about the accident but could not recall the exact details as he had amnesia for about 4 months after the accident. His dad, Khairi had left the family for another woman two months before. Khairi's parents and siblings who were against him marrying Salina, a former waitress, had reasons to celebrate. Instead of providing family support to Salina, they distanced themselves away.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 15 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Najiha and Hana seek solace in the village, both struggling with issues in their love lives. Jaafar advises Eddy to stop focusing on him and instead concentrate on Hana's relationship with Khalis.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 16 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Khalis confronts Jaafar after seeing him with Hana. Meanwhile, Eddy's trust in Shafiq leaves him with deep disappointment and pain.

programme.title: Episode 4 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Masak Macam Saya 2 returns with more drama, fun, hacks & tips from the kitchen! This cooking reality series showcases more culinary-challenged celebrities competing against each other over a series of cooking challenges while being coached by our mentor chef; and this time, dishes extend to international cuisines! Each episode is thematically designed to feature dishes with a specific purpose.

programme.title: (PG) (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: BOOBEAR, a hired comedian dressed as a PANDA, and his best friend, SLASH, work hard to raise money as a dowry for BOOBEAR to marry ZARA. Throughout the process they got stuck in various problems. But in the end, BOOBEAR managed to collect the sending money in full on his wedding day. But, BOOBEAR came with his PANDA costume while ZARA came with her wedding dress.

programme.title: Episode 3 (English/Malay Subtitles)

programme.title: Episode 13

programme.desc: Karikal Mahal, built by Moona Kader Sultan, symbolises his rise in Singapore's cattle trade. Lavish parties followed his success, but rivalries and scandals cast shadows on his reputation.

programme.title: Episode 12 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Join our documentary series as we traverse Indonesian cities, uncovering new and exciting places brimming with culture and fun. From bustling street food stalls to hidden gems, each episode unveils the flavors, stories and traditions that make Indonesia cuisine a tantalizing journey worth savoring.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: New teams on the block! Two groups from SIT make their debut, but what sets Ardwinda apart from Ardwinda 2.1? This episode dives into their team names, the props used, and the rich history of dikir barat. With emotions running high, tension fills the air as teams push to their limits. Go behind the scenes to witness their intense preparations and hear exclusive interviews capturing the raw emotions after each performance in this thrilling episode of Piala Suara Serumpun 2024!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Age is not a barrier for both Mdms Jumiah Yunus and Zainab Sani to lead an active lifestyle and contribute to society. programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. The discussions ranging from controvercial topics to gossip and current events. Moreover, surprises from the guests of the show often go beyond all your expectation that you don't want to miss out!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: Pocket List
programme.desc: Tired of squeezing through crowds at the same old tourist spots?Then you’ve got to check out "Pocket List"! We’re all about finding those super chill, hidden gems and crazy-good eats you’d never stumble across on your own.

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes
programme.desc: This as your health as the number 1 , all the 0 followed afterwards are all yours! But without health, without the number1, no matter how many 0 are added afterwards, it is still 0. How to avoid getting sick? How to get sick less frequently? How to recover faster? How to maintain a healthy life? "Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: Pass Through Con-Csi
programme.desc: Pass Through Con-Csi', which hosted by Hank Chen will take you to reminisce the laughter and tears of the 12 years of Con-Csi, as well as the unrevealed stories on front stage and back stages, and let Con-Csi continue to accompany everyone around.

programme.title: College Talk
programme.desc: In each episode, students from different colleges and backgrounds are invited to represent the new generation and take challenges of different problems. They speak what they want to speak the most, and do what they love the most. The topics are lively and critical.

programme.title: The Queen's Legendary Show
programme.desc: The Queen's Legendary Show, tailored by EELIN Entertainment for Li Jing, features a completely new style and incorporates elements of "time-travel costume" breaking away from the conventional framework of variety shows and bringing audiences a fresh and novel experience."

programme.title: True Love Blog
programme.desc: Interviews with famous TV anchor Lulu Hsia. People share personal testimonies of how God carried them through some of the most difficult seasons of life. These lovely Christians are willing to share their darkest and weakest side of their lives to the public in order to bring the most beautiful blessings from heaven to everyone. Each of their witness is with blood and tears, which brought the most shocking transformation and the most profound truth.

programme.desc: Hao's Mission is hosted by the anchor Jian Zhi Hao. Let's follow the handsome anchor Jian Zhi Hao to explore a wild and a practical life experience!

programme.title: Hao's Mission
programme.desc: Hao's Mission is hosted by the anchor Jian Zhi Hao. Let's follow the handsome anchor Jian Zhi Hao to explore a wild and a practical life experience!

programme.title: The Queen's Legendary Show
programme.desc: The Queen's Legendary Show, tailored by EELIN Entertainment for Li Jing, features a completely new style and incorporates elements of "time-travel costume" breaking away from the conventional framework of variety shows and bringing audiences a fresh and novel experience."

programme.title: CTI News Live
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Artists who come to accept the challenge must fast for 12 hours before the start of the competition. During the competition, you can only get food when you win the game!

programme.title: Searchome
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: CTI TALK Online Forum
programme.desc: In 2024, CTiTV will launch a new online forum titled "Cross-Strait Permanent Peace: Masters' Dialogue Series." We have invited top-tier experts to explore the possibilities of permanent peace across the Taiwan Strait and to analyze the collective anxiety within the younger generation.

programme.title: Pocket List
programme.desc: Tired of squeezing through crowds at the same old tourist spots?Then you’ve got to check out "Pocket List"! We’re all about finding those super chill, hidden gems and crazy-good eats you’d never stumble across on your own.

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes
programme.desc: This as your health as the number 1 , all the 0 followed afterwards are all yours! But without health, without the number1, no matter how many 0 are added afterwards, it is still 0. How to avoid getting sick? How to get sick less frequently? How to recover faster? How to maintain a healthy life? "Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: CTI News Live
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: Students Coming
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: Behind the Frame
programme.desc: With refined cinematography, this series captures touching untold stories and showcases timeless architectural wonders across eras.

programme.title: CTI TALK Global Showdown
programme.desc: Selected international news affairs, from news reports, special analysis to experts discussion. First-hand live broadcast, providing diversed and comprehensive perspectives , which won the praise from all over the world Chinese.

programme.title: CTI TALK Global Showdown
programme.desc: Selected international news affairs, from news reports, special analysis to experts discussion. First-hand live broadcast, providing diversed and comprehensive perspectives , which won the praise from all over the world Chinese.

programme.title: Dream Maker
programme.desc: Dream Maker is a reality show that invites celebrities to accomplish their dream pursuing mission, pursue celebrities' dreams.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yang's escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, he'd still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tai's best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s "a-go-go" era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named "The Fastest Sword" but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense...

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong's enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and guarded by top martial arts masters. Two powerful patriots need to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them...

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: New Tales of the Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill's nieces!

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his father's martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hung's passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lu's disciple.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Long River
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: The Ingenious One
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2
programme.desc: 3 Gongdan is a village where the souls of missing deceased people gather. Meanwhile, the protagonists in the drama try to find the bodies of the missing and figure out the truth.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: Our Generation
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lin Qile and Jiang Qiaoxi reconnect in high school after a childhood friendship and a lingering misunderstanding. As they navigate youth's ups and downs alongside their classmates, they grow through shared experiences and step into new horizons.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1

programme.title: Shack Attack
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: We Meat Again
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Featherhide
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young "cloaking" dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Gone Gustav Gone
programme.desc: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: We Are Family (Part 1)
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless search for other Night Furies.

programme.title: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Trolling Through Iceland
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: That's Sooo Rob
programme.desc: Julien’s former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Eep-Over / Thunkytown
programme.desc: When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise
programme.desc: Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Towaconstrictors
programme.desc: Revvit maps a path to a magical forest where the Dinotrux can explore and have fun, but once they arrive the crew is startled by Towaconstrictors

programme.title: Fall Of The Castle Of Lions
programme.desc: When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: The Day Mel Fell/Burns Ex Boo
programme.desc: Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Tough As Snails/Conspiracy
programme.desc: Whiplash takes on the toughest creature around in a MMA-style fight; When the FAST crew is abducted, Skidmark and his conspiracy club get on the case.

programme.title: Trick or Thief / Meow-Lo-Ween
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes’ famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Superfan / Barb
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift
programme.desc: Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers
programme.desc: When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy
programme.desc: Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Lucky and the Jam Jam
programme.desc: The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.title: Night Owls
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: OCB
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Guy Time
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: Game Nightmare
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 2
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: A Hole New World
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: As the Diaper Changes
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Family On The Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2
programme.desc: Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: In Dreams
programme.desc: When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: Fluteus Maximus
programme.desc: When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens
programme.desc: After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger
programme.desc: Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months - everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Curse of the Monkey King
programme.desc: Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: A Game of Fists
programme.desc: When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: As the Diaper Changes
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Family On The Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2
programme.desc: Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Parental Stridence
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: A Hair-ifying Night
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Please Hold for the Next Representative
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Please Hold While We Connect You
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: Downpour
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: The Tangled Web
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Follow the Lightning: Part 1
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery
programme.desc: When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Monster Machine
programme.desc: The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: The Constipation Situation
programme.desc: Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: As the Diaper Changes
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Family On The Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2
programme.desc: Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: Fault Ripper
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Reign Of Fireworms
programme.desc: Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: We Are Family (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and must escape Outcast Island.

programme.title: Gongmen City Hustle
programme.desc: Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Gibraltar ROCKS!
programme.desc: When Wally and Wenda head to WWS Great Magic Key Vault, located in Gibraltar, to find Whitebeard a key for his birthday, they find that Odlulu has already cleaned out the vault; the Wanderers must round up all these keys, and they’ll have to do it in time for Whitebeard’s surprise birthday party.

programme.title: The Man In The Iron Booty
programme.desc: King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Mom Genes
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door
programme.desc: When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Desert Scraptors
programme.desc: When the Desert Scraptors mistakenly think Click-Clack is their leader, D-Structs' plan to have them attack Ty and the crew is derailed.

programme.title: Tears Of Balmera
programme.desc: Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon. Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Groundhog Stay/Gone Guys Gone
programme.desc: Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole; Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.

programme.title: Party Poopers/The League
programme.desc: The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: The Trouble with Kibbles / Road to Kindness
programme.desc: When Tag asks Mom to be the pilot for the upcoming Dogcaththlon race, Mom isn’t sure she is ready. Until Paw reminds her of the day she saved Pawston! Mom tells the story of how she used her blimp to save the city from an eruption at the kibble factory. / Pawston is hosting a Roller Disco Night in the park, but Frank isn't allowed to attend due to last year's poor behavior. Tag convinces Mayor Sniffington to let Frank come to the party if he passes Leo's Road to Kindness.

programme.title: Memory Spark / Wondertusk
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty
programme.desc: In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade
programme.desc: Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Lucky and the Escape Artist
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky "borrows" Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Lucky and the Thin Ice
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Baby Boss
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Parental Stridence
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Dragon Club
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Featherhide
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young "cloaking" dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: As the Diaper Changes
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Family On The Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2
programme.desc: Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Prey Time
programme.desc: When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: Breaking Good
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Wu You Gonna Call?
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their "creature awareness" message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: The Ditch Sitch
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Beast of the Wasteland
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Danger in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: As the Diaper Changes

programme.title: The Flopping of the Bullruses
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Remote Control
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Everest Returns
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Welcome Home, Everest!
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help.

programme.title: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Follow the Lightning: Part 2
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Fire Escape
programme.desc: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex’s new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: Ride or Die
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: The Boss Babysitter
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats
programme.desc: Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a sumo highlights programme for fans around the globe featuring all top-division bouts from Day 6 of the latest Grand Sumo tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: A nationwide inspection of Japan's aging sewer pipes has uncovered dangerous deterioration in many places, largely in urban areas. We investigate the threat and see how authorities are responding.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Yoshida Katsuji investigates unexplored caves around the world and won the Uemura Naomi Adventure Award for his achievements in Laos - here he talks about the appeal of cave exploration.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Urban intrusions by bears have increased significantly worldwide in recent years - what's behind this phenomenon, and how is it related to global warming? We focus our investigation on cases in Japan.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Sudden Shower: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter; on the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat unfazed by the rain. Where is he going?

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Hydrogen gas inhalation is proving to be a potential game-changer in emergency medicine. It improves survival rates and reduces severe aftereffects that can occur after the heart restarts.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Hatoba Shoryu and his son, Yoho, are artisans who hand-paint kamon or family crests onto kimono. Combining classic designs with digital technology, they are creating new artistic expressions.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Osaka. A thriving trade and economic hub with a unique culture; join us on a hunt for regional designs that prioritise human connection in the welcoming city of Osaka.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Home of the Wa people in Yunnan Province, Wengding is called China's 'last traditional village' - however, residents have moved away with the village now run by an outside developer to boost tourism.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 19 SEP (Live)

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 19 SEP
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Iliman Ndiaye will forever go down in history as the man who scored the last ever goal at Everton's famous old ground Goodison Park, only to follow it this season with the first strike at their impressive new home, Hill Dickinson Stadium. This week, Everton's talismanic forward shares his fascinating story. Having grown up in Senegal and France, the young man struggled to make his mark in the game before moving to England with his father.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 19 SEP
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 19 SEP
programme.desc: We preview the Merseyside derby, Arsenal's clash with Manchester City and Chelsea's trip to Manchester United on a blockbuster Premier League weekend.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Iliman Ndiaye will forever go down in history as the man who scored the last ever goal at Everton's famous old ground Goodison Park, only to follow it this season with the first strike at their impressive new home, Hill Dickinson Stadium. This week, Everton's talismanic forward shares his fascinating story. Having grown up in Senegal and France, the young man struggled to make his mark in the game before moving to England with his father.

programme.title: Prime Time
programme.desc: When the Tanners become a Nielsen family, ALF rigs the people meter to "skew up" the ratings of his favorite shows--which causes havoc for NBC's President Brandon Tartikoff.

programme.title: Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: At ALF's urging, Willie hosts a Halloween costume party to impress his boss and get a better job. ALF decides to invite everyone to the scary bash becomes the celebrated figure of the evening.

programme.title: Oh Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Lynn is upset when a boy rejects her at a school dance. Fearing she may not be as pretty, she turns to her family for support. ALF enrolls her in a beauty contest, but ALF's plan to help Lynn is not without some surprises.

programme.title: Death in the Clouds (Part 1)
programme.desc: A murder is committed on the noon flight from Paris to London. Poirot is on board - but unfortunately he's asleep when the killing takes place. It becomes a matter of pride for him to track down the murderer.

programme.title: Death in the Clouds (Part 2)
programme.desc: A murder is committed on the noon flight from Paris to London. Poirot is on board - but unfortunately he's asleep when the killing takes place. It becomes a matter of pride for him to track down the murderer.

programme.title: Gitano
programme.desc: The IMF hides a young prince from assassins by disguising him as a gypsy girl.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: To fight an aging dictator's purge of young artists, an IMF member becomes a ghost and Paris assumes the guise of a man long dead.

programme.title: HX 1
programme.desc: When an incredible piece of machinery, the HX1, seems to have been the cause of extensive damage at an aircrafr corporation, Hawke has reason to believe that his brother, whom he thought dead, was part of the operation.

programme.title: Flight #093 Is Missing (Undertow)
programme.desc: Airwolf with Hawke and Dominic on board volunteer for a rescue mission after they learn that Caitlin is a passenger on the missing plane.

programme.title: Once A Hero (Heroes)
programme.desc: Once again Hawke thinks that he has some clues as to his brother's wherabouts, and he vows he will go to the ends of the earth to get Saint John Hawke out of the prison camp in Laos.

programme.title: A Most Unusual Wood Nymph

programme.desc: Uncle Arthur pops out of a painting in the Stephens home. Samantha tells him she is trying to stop Endora from encouraging Tabitha to use her witchcraft.

programme.title: Twitch or Treat

programme.title: Dangerous Diaper Dan
programme.desc: Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.title: Sir John Kaputin
programme.desc: An influential leader of the Mataungan Association, Sir John Kaputin was a Tolai man who advocated for self-determination.

programme.desc: Now twice a week on Monday and Friday nights, Chas and John take a closer look at the President's State Visit to the UK to meet with King Charles, the pursuit of peace in Ukraine and Gaza, plus the UN General Assembly.

programme.desc: At an elephant conservation centre in Lampang, Emeline experiences the immense love that the Thai people feel for their national animal.
