programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a tragic mission left scars and secrets, Inspector Tam and Madam Fong return to Macau with a new generation of Special Female Force team. But when a familiar face from the past resurfaces during a high-risk escort mission, history threatens to repeat itself.

programme.title: James' Going Places
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The "passion choir pilot program" trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the "passion choir" and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Dora's Song For Papi / Pirate Piggies
programme.desc: Dora travels across the rainforest, creating a song for her dad so they can celebrate Papi-Dora day!/Dora is ready for the Churro Fiesta when the Pirate Piggies eat all the churros. Dora tracks down a treasure chest of golden churros to save the day!

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: The Barbababies Have Got Talent / Triple Switcheroo
programme.desc: Every barbababy is invited to show their greatest talent on stage. // Video games are fun, but you also need to know how to enjoy the nice weather!

programme.title: The Snow, Sea, Sky, Race
programme.desc: Blaze and Crusher face off in an off-road showdown: the Snow, Sea, Sky Race! The trucks must speed through the snow, swim through the sea, and soar to a finish line in the sky! Will Blaze win the trophy? Or will Crusher be the all-terrain champion?

programme.title: Blaze's First Race
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends remember their first ever race together, back when they were little monster machines with BIG dreams of becoming racers!

programme.title: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer
programme.desc: Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor
programme.desc: The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Pups Save Rocket Ryder
programme.desc: The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride
programme.desc: After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. // Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: The Crew Raises A Runway / The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard
programme.desc: When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build // Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show. But when it rolls out of control, the pups lead the chase!

programme.title: A Pinata For Mami / Invisi-Swiper
programme.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami's birthday, but it flies away! They have to get it back safe before Mami arrives. / Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket! Now Invisi-Swiper is swiping everything, and it's up to Dora and Boots to stop him.

programme.title: Funny Fish / Club Cool
programme.desc: Goldie embraces her serious side to impress a director from Chomp City. // Everyfishy wants to join Shadow's cool new club.

programme.title: Findependence Day / Costello Quits
programme.desc: Fishy Force takes on a villain who steals all the treats in Carnivore Cove. // When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: The Noisy Night
programme.desc: Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: The Wishing Well
programme.desc: Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party
programme.desc: The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Desert Island
programme.desc: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Perfume
programme.desc: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: The Children's Fete
programme.desc: The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley / The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now! // When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flower-friendly construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Center / The Crew Builds A Roller Rink
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway and Mr. Ducky-Doo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground! // When Wheeler and Truffles the pig can't ice skate, the crew finds a construction solution with wheels!

programme.title: Pups Save the Elephant Spa / Pups Save an Underwater Otis
programme.desc: While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa. // Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: Pups vs. The Hum-Flectors / Pups Save a Capybara
programme.desc: A drone carrying Humdinger's reflecting panel crashes in a tree, the reflector concentrates a beam of light on a wooden bridge, causing it to burn. // The Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara when they go rolling off in a giant exercise ball.

programme.title: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo...
programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse
programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples
programme.desc: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Sparkle's Big Rescue
programme.desc: When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: The White Whale
programme.desc: Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in
programme.desc: When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Pups Save a Toof
programme.desc: Alex is afraid to go to the dentist, so Chase and the PAW Patrol work together to show Alex that fears can be overcome.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: George's New Dinosaur
programme.desc: When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: The Pet Competition
programme.desc: Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Snow
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Grandpa Pig's Computer
programme.desc: Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.desc: Every barbababy is invited to show their greatest talent on stage. // Video games are fun, but you also need to know how to enjoy the nice weather!

programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse
programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples
programme.desc: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Sparkle's Big Rescue
programme.desc: When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: The White Whale
programme.desc: Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in
programme.desc: When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Pups Save a Toof
programme.desc: Alex is afraid to go to the dentist, so Chase and the PAW Patrol work together to show Alex that fears can be overcome.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Abuela's Quinceanera / Story Time
programme.desc: Dora finds out that her Abuela never had a quinceańera and throws her a super-secret surprise party with a special dress, tiara, and shoes! // Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story for Story Time, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one!

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Vandal! / Tumbles, Where Did You Go?
programme.desc: Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. // Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Wild West Heroes
programme.desc: Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: The Driving Force
programme.desc: When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they'll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep
programme.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day
programme.desc: Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew!
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash
programme.desc: Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution. // Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland / The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland. // When a snow day gets in the way of Motor & Mix's Super Squirrely Whirly plans, Rubble & Crew do what they do best... build!

programme.title: Isa's Royal Garden Party / Sammy's Surprise
programme.desc: The Queen of Reptiles is visiting Isa, but the garden's a mess! Dora helps her get everything ready in time for La Reina's visit. / Dora meets Sammy the Sloth, who needs to get to Day Camp on time so he can show everyone a special surprise.

programme.title: Finloose / Operation Ernie
programme.desc: When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! // Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: FLOWMO / Fishy Scouts
programme.desc: When all the other fishies are out of town during winter vacation, Baby and William create their very own fin-credible day of friendship. // Chucks takes a unique approach to camping on his first trip with the Fishy Scouts.

programme.title: Night Animals
programme.desc: It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Flying on Holiday Part 1
programme.desc: The Pig family are going on vacation. Peppa and George pack their favorite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

programme.title: The Holiday House Part 2
programme.desc: Peppa and her family arrive in Italy. Everyone is talking in a different language and Daddy Pig finds driving on the right a little difficult.

programme.title: Holiday in the Sun Part 3
programme.desc: On the first day in their vacation villa, Peppa and her family go exploring in the local village.

programme.title: End of the Holiday Part 4
programme.desc: Peppa has enjoyed her very first holiday abroad, but it is now time to go home. She can't wait to see Suzy and Goldie again.

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Pedro is Late
programme.desc: The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Garden Games
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Hiccupism / Silence please
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: The Crew Raises A Runway / The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard
programme.desc: When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build // Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show. But when it rolls out of control, the pups lead the chase!

programme.title: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride
programme.desc: After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. // Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: Pups Save a Talkative Mini Patrol / Pups Save the History of Adventure Bay
programme.desc: Alex dreams that his Mini Patrol animals can talk as they take the Bookmobile on a wild adventure! // Mayor Humdinger steals "The History of Adventure Bay," the book falls apart, and It's up to the Paw Patrol to retrieve it.

programme.title: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention
programme.desc: During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom
programme.desc: With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuna who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Mail Truck Blaze
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Boris / Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Legendary Loot / Yup Day
programme.desc: After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Sherman in the Middle
programme.desc: Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters.

programme.title: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Pups and the Trouble with Turtles
programme.desc: Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it's up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Cafe / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Cafe Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: George's Racing Car
programme.desc: It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: The Little Boat
programme.desc: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: The Sandpit
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.desc: Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Wolves are winless in their last four Premier League meetings with Leeds United (D1 L3) despite scoring first in three of those games.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Only Nicolas Anelka (18) has more Premier League goals against sides he previously played for in the competition than Nottingham Forest’s Chris Wood (14), two of which came against Burnley on his last league trip to Turf Moor in May 2024.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe has never beaten former side Bournemouth in six attempts in the Premier League (D4 L2), one of three teams he’s faced in the competition and is yet to beat, along with Luton (D1 L1) and Man City (D2 L16).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25 (Data Zone)
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City (D2), as many as their previous 22 beforehand (D5 L15). The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season - the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs.
